title: The five biggest tech companies lost more than $400 billion in value on Thursday
text: Apple, Facebook, Alphabet, Amazon and Microsoft lost a combined $416.63 billion on Thursday as fears about the coronavirus and its effects on the economy continued to scare investors.

title: 3 Reasons to Buy Facebook Stock in the Wake of Coronavirus
